text: Magdolna "Magda" Gabor (June 11, 1915 - June 6, 1997)The birth year of 1915 is cited in Hungary: Jewish Names from the Central Zionist Archives, an online database (Provo, UT, USA: The Generations Network, Inc., 2008). The information was accessed on ancestry.com on December 30, 2011. was a Hungarian-American movie, television, stage, voice, and radio actress and socialite. She was the elder sister of Zsa Zsa Gabor and Eva Gabor. Gabor was born on June 11, 1915 in Budapest, Austria-Hungary. She was married to Jan Bychowski from 1937 until he died in 1944. Then she was married to William Rankin from 1946 until they divorced in 1947. Then she was married to Sidney R. Warren from 1947 until they divorced in 1950. Then she was married to Arthur Gallucci from 1956 until they divorced in 1957. Then she was married to George Sanders from 1970 until they divorced in 1971. She was last married to Tibor Heltai from 1972 until they divorced in 1973. Gabor died on June 6, 1997 in Palm Springs, California from renal failure, aged 81. She was later buried at Desert Memorial Park in Cathedral City, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Gabor family website Category:1915 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Actors from Budapest Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American socialites Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Disease-related deaths in the United States Category:Hungarian movie actors Category:People from Palm Desert, California
title: Magda Gabor
